title: S & T Bancorp Stock Rating Lowered by Zacks (STBA)
text:
Tweet 
S & T Bancorp (NASDAQ:STBA) was downgraded by Zacks from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating in a research note issued on Friday, MarketBeat reports. 
  
STBA has been the topic of several other reports. RBC Capital boosted their price objective on S & T Bancorp from $29.00 to $32.00 and gave the company a “sector perform” rating in a report on Wednesday, July 22nd. Keefe, Bruyette & Woods upped their price target on S & T Bancorp from $31.00 to $33.00 and gave the stock an “outperform” rating in a report on Wednesday, July 22nd. Finally, Piper Jaffray began coverage on S & T Bancorp in a research note on Thursday, June 4th. They set an “overweight” rating for the company. Five analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and one has given a buy rating to the company. S & T Bancorp has a consensus rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of $32.00. 
In other S & T Bancorp news,   company’s stock in a transaction on Thursday, July 23rd. The stock was sold at an average price of $32.54, for a total transaction of $2,440,500.00. The transaction was disclosed in a legal filing with the SEC, which can be accessed through the SEC website . 
S & T Bancorp ( NASDAQ:STBA ) traded down 0.24% during mid-day trading on Friday, hitting $29.48. The company had a trading volume of 84,727 shares. The company has a 50-day moving average price of $30.63 and a 200 day moving average price of $29.00. The firm has a market capitalization of $1.03 billion and a P/E ratio of 15.40. S & T Bancorp has a 12 month low of $23.07 and a 12 month high of $32.88. 
S & T Bancorp (NASDAQ:STBA) last announced its earnings results   topping the Thomson Reuters consensus estimate of $0.48 by $0.04. During the same quarter last year, the firm earned $0.49 earnings per share. The business had revenue of $62.20 million for the quarter, compared to analysts’ expectations of $59 million. Equities analysts forecast that S & T Bancorp will post $2.04 EPS for the current fiscal year. 
The company also recently disclosed a dividend, which was paid on Thursday, August 20th. Shareholders of record on Thursday, August 6th were paid a dividend of $0.18 per share. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Tuesday, August 4th.
